sourcesContent:
<template>
    <main>
        <router-view>
        </router-view>
    </main>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'AppContent',
}
</script>


<style>
/* css for main */
main {
  margin-top: 3.6rem;
  background: #100b1b;
  background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #100b1b 0%, #131736 100%);
  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #100b1b 0%, #131736 100%);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #100b1b 0%, #131736 100%);
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#100b1b', endColorstr='#131736',GradientType=1 );
  padding-top: 0.1rem;
  padding-bottom: 0.1rem;
}

/* form css (for login and register) */
main > .form {
  width: 100%;
  height: fit-content;

  display: flex;

  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

  padding-top: 5.9rem;
  padding-bottom: 5.9rem;
}

main > .sell {
  padding-top: 0.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 0.4rem;
}

main > .register{
  padding-top: 3rem;
  padding-bottom: 2.9rem;
}

main > .form > form {
  width: fit-content;
  height: fit-content;

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

  background: #00000071;

  padding: 4rem 3rem;
  padding-bottom: 2rem;

  border-radius: 10px;

  border-bottom: solid 3px white;
  border-right: solid 3px white;
}

main > .form > form > div {
  width: 100%;
}

main > .form > form .container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

  width: fit-content;

  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;

  border-bottom: solid 4px white;
}

main > .form > form .container * {
  width: 100%;

  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

main > .form > form .container input,
main > .form > form .container textarea {
  outline: none;
  border: none;

  padding: 1rem 2rem;

  border-radius: 4px;

  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

main > .form > form .container button {
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  outline: none;
  border: none;
  color: white;

  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  border-color: white;
  border-width: 0.2rem;
  border-style: solid;
  border-radius: 0.2rem;

  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;

  transition-duration: 200ms;
}

main > .form > form .container button:hover {
  color: #414142;
  background-color: white;
}

main > .form > form .otherOption {
  color: white;
}

main > .form > form .otherOption a {
  color: white;
}

</style>
